events.title: Cinematography Masterclass: Light & Shadow
events.description: Join me for an intensive day exploring the art of visual storytelling through light and shadow techniques. This masterclass covers both theoretical concepts and hands-on demonstrations.
events.location: Film Arts Center, 123 Cinema Ave, Los Angeles, CA

events.title: Behind the Lens: Director & Cinematographer Panel
events.description: A conversation exploring the collaborative relationship between directors and cinematographers. I'll be joining acclaimed directors to discuss our creative processes and the art of visual storytelling.
events.location: Independent Film Society, 456 Director's Row, New York, NY

events.title: Film Festival Screening: 'Through the Glass Darkly'
events.description: Join us for the premiere screening of 'Through the Glass Darkly', a feature film where I served as Director of Photography. Q&A session with the director and key crew members following the screening.
events.location: Riverview Cinema, 789 Festival Blvd, Austin, TX

events.title: Lighting Workshop for Independent Filmmakers
events.description: A practical, hands-on workshop focused on achieving professional cinematic lighting with limited equipment and budget. Perfect for independent filmmakers and students.
events.location: Creative Studios, 321 Indie Lane, Portland, OR

events.title: Experimental Cinematography Exhibition
events.description: A gallery exhibition showcasing experimental cinematography techniques through interactive installations, projections, and behind-the-scenes materials from my recent projects.
events.location: Modern Visual Arts Gallery, 567 Contemporary Way, Miami, FL

events.title: Anamorphic Lens Showcase & Demo Day
events.description: Get hands-on experience with a wide range of vintage and modern anamorphic lenses. I'll be demonstrating techniques and providing insights on lens selection for different storytelling needs.
events.location: Camera Equipment Pro, 890 Lens Avenue, Chicago, IL

events.title: Virtual Lighting Masterclass for Remote Production
events.description: Learn effective techniques for directing lighting remotely in this online workshop designed for today's distributed production environments. Covering communication strategies, pre-viz tools, and remote monitoring solutions.

events.title: Retrospective: Evolution of Visual Storytelling
events.description: A retrospective screening and discussion of influential works that have shaped modern visual storytelling. I'll be presenting an analysis of key cinematographic techniques and their impact on narrative film.
events.location: Film Heritage Theater, 432 Classic Boulevard, San Francisco, CA
